title: Đừng quên ta (Thiên Thiên Hữu Hỷ OST)
lyrics: Hợp âm viết ở Tone - Tone gốc B: Capo 4 Feng chuo luo meng yi de shau suì yu hua shang le nian hua cheng jing shua hao wai lai mei ru hua nan dao zhi shi meng hua shi guang ni bien zai zheng fa qing chun liu bu zhu luo xia sheng nou zhi zai xin yi lieu fan hya wei he yang zhong man shi lei hua ye suo zao ying gai fang xian zou guo choun nuan huo dong xiang ai hen xang zai xin jian nan ruang hua shuí gei wo zui hao de jie dao ye xuo zao ying gai fang xian hei ye lia wo huì hai pa bu yao ba wo yi geu ren dua xian xiang ting jian jian ding de hui dao feng juan yui man tian fei shan mo huyn le ni de lian jian yan kan shin jian man mang de zheng fan zue zhi ba ley liu xia
